name: steakhouse

a restaurant that specializes in serving steak: The portions at this steakhouse chain are huge. Charlie's Steak House is one of the best restaurants around here. Compare
chophouse
More examplesFewer examplesThe menu includes all the dishes you’d expect of a high-end steakhouse. When they got to the steakhouse, there was a long queue of people waiting to get in.This affordable steak house also offers superb fresh seafood.
